attributes.action: Have the Arts Council turn over their decision to cut back on funding at the Trinity Arts Centre.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Arts Council of England recently announced that they are planning to make cuts to the funding received by the Trinity Theatre and Arts Centre of Church Road, Tunbridge Wells. Without the amount of funding it receives from the Arts Council, the centre ould not survive - we therefore wish to encourage them to turn over their decision to save the centre.
